title: Make homepage cruise ship hero image full screen

requirements.text: Update the homepage Hero section (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx) so the cruise ship picture fills the full screen (full viewport height and width) while maintaining aspect ratio using a cover-style layout.

quotes: The picture of the cruise ship needs to be full screen

acceptanceCriteria: On the homepage, the hero area uses the full viewport height (e.g., equivalent to Tailwind's h-screen/min-h-screen) instead of a fixed height.
The cruise ship image (/assets/generated/cruise-ship-hero.dim_1600x900.jpg) visually covers the full hero area (no empty side space), cropping as needed rather than letterboxing.
Hero text/CTAs remain visible on top of the full-screen image and are still readable in both light and dark modes.
No changes are required in the backend; this is a styling/layout-only update.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the cruise ship image asset itself (only layout/fit behavior should change).
Adding new homepage sections or new backend endpoints.
